sentences.en: And the damsel ran, and told them of her mother's house these things.
sentences.cn: 女子跑回去, 照着这些话告诉她母亲和她家里的人.

sentences.en: And they said, We will call the damsel, and enquire at her mouth.
sentences.cn: 57他们说, 我们把女子叫来问问她.

sentences.en: Courage is the quality that attracted the beautiful damsel to him.
sentences.cn: 是他的勇气吸引住了这位美丽的少女.

sentences.en: Hallo, Dant è s! hello, lovely damsel!
sentences.cn: 喂, 唐太斯, 喂, 美丽的姑娘!

sentences.en: Have you come because you need my help to save a distressing damsel?
sentences.cn: 你来是因为需要我的帮助,去拯救一位非常悲伤的少女?

sentences.en: He keeps coming to the aid of this damsel in distress.
sentences.cn: 他不断出手相助这位落难女子。

sentences.en: He was fawning on a damsel with soft words.
sentences.cn: 他正用甜言蜜语向一位女郞献殷勤.

sentences.en: In the story, the lorn damsel languished and pined away.
sentences.cn: 在那个故事中, 那位孤寂的少女郁闷不乐,渐渐地消瘦了.

sentences.en: Men must like a damsel in distress, I decided.
sentences.cn: 我想,男人们肯定喜欢落魄少女.

sentences.en: Merlin fell in a dotage on the damsel.
sentences.cn: 墨林深深地爱上那少女.

sentences.en: Most men will help a damsel in distress.
sentences.cn: 男人多愿帮助有困难的女子.

sentences.en: The damsel distracted the Asuras, while the Devas secretly drank the Nectar.
sentences.cn: 正当这个少女使阿修罗心烦意乱的时候,天神们背地里喝了甘露.

sentences.en: Then said Boaz unto his servant that was set over the reapers, Whose damsel is this?
sentences.cn: 波阿斯问监管收割的仆人说, 那是谁家的女子.

sentences.en: You were a proud damsel then.
sentences.cn: 你那时候是个自豪的少妇.

trans.tran_cn: 少女，年轻女人，<古，诗>闺女
trans.tran_en: A damsel is a young, unmarried woman
